<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Asura Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=3940) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 33</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Faultspawn](/Feats.aspx?ID=3937)

</column>

---

You can cast [_blood vendetta_](/Spells.aspx?ID=675) and [_death knell_](/Spells.aspx?ID=63) once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
name: Asura Magic
